/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/HelloWindow.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/HelloWindow.dir/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/HelloWindow.dir/shader.cpp.o  -o HelloWindow -lglfw3 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglut.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXmu.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXi.so -lGL -lm -ldl -lXinerama -lXrandr -lXi -lXcursor -lX11 -lXxf86vm -lpthread
